parameter.value:
<script>
var datalayer_data = {{datalayer.addToWishlist}};
var currency = 'EUR'; //Only compatible with EUR  

var product_object = {};

//NOT SEND TRACKING IF EUR PRICE IS NOT DEFINED
  if(typeof datalayer_data.price_eur === 'undefined') {
    console.error("Stileo pixel only is compatible with EUR currency, please install EUR currency in your shop");
  } else {
    product_object.Id = datalayer_data.id;
    product_object.Name = datalayer_data.name;
    product_object.Price = datalayer_data.price_eur;
    product_object.Quantity = datalayer_data.quantity;
    product_object.Brand = typeof datalayer_data.brand !== 'undefined' ? datalayer_data.brand : 'undefined';
 
    stileo('track', 'ProductFavourite', {
      "Products": [product_object]
    });
  }
</script>

tag.name: Facebook - Audience pixel - Add to cart

parameter.value:
<script>
	var track_info = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
  	var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
	var object = {};
    
	if(typeof track_info.id_fb != 'undefined')
		object.content_ids = track_info.id_fb;
  	if(typeof track_info.name != 'undefined')
		object.content_name = track_info.name;

	object.content_type = 'product';
  	object.currency = currency;
  	object.value = track_info.price;
 
    fbq('track', 'AddToCart', object, {'eventID': track_info.fb_event_id});
</script>

<script>
var currentUrl = window.location.href;
var track = true;
  
if (currentUrl.indexOf("dash.flowytracking") !== -1) {
  track = false;
}
  
if (track) {
    data = {
      'event_name' : 'trackView',
      'fb_pixel_id' : '{{Facebook Pixel - Facebook Conversions API - Pixel ID}}',
      'fb_token' : '{{Facebook Conversions API - API Token}}',
      'fb_api_track_info' : {{Facebook Conversions API - track_info}}
    };
  
    if(typeof ft_facebook_api_track != 'undefined')
      ft_facebook_api_track(data);
    else //Opencart - Google Marketing Tools compatibility
      gmt_facebook_track(data);
}
</script>

<script>
var datalayer_data = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
var currency = 'EUR'; //Only compatible with EUR  

var product_object = {};

//NOT SEND TRACKING IF EUR PRICE IS NOT DEFINED
  if(typeof datalayer_data.price_eur === 'undefined') {
    console.error("Stileo pixel only is compatible with EUR currency, please install EUR currency in your shop");
  } else {
    product_object.Id = datalayer_data.id;
    product_object.Name = datalayer_data.name;
    product_object.Price = datalayer_data.price_eur;
    product_object.Quantity = datalayer_data.quantity;
    product_object.Brand = typeof datalayer_data.brand !== 'undefined' ? datalayer_data.brand : 'not_defined';
  
    /* TODO
    product_object.OldPrice = xxx;  WHEN HAS SPECIAL
    product_object.CategoryPath = xxx;  THE CATEGORY PATH FULL URL
    product_object.PhotoUrl = xxx;   THE PRODUCT MAIN IMAGE URL
    */

    stileo('track', 'AddToCart', {
      "Currency": currency,
      "Products": [product_object]
    });
  }
</script>

tag.name: FB Conversions API - Add to cart

parameter.value:
<script>
  var track_info = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
  var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
  var system = {{datalayer.system}};
  var data = {
    'event_name' : 'addToCart',
    'fb_pixel_id' : '{{Facebook Pixel - Facebook Conversions API - Pixel ID}}',
    'fb_token' : '{{Facebook Conversions API - API Token}}'
  };
  if(system == 'shopify'){
    data['fb_api_track_info'] = {{Facebook Conversions API - track_info}};
  }
  if(typeof track_info.id_fb != 'undefined')
    data.content_ids = track_info.id_fb;
  if(typeof track_info.name != 'undefined')
    data.content_name = track_info.name;
  data.content_type = 'product';
  data.currency = currency;
  data.value = track_info.price;
  data.content_category = track_info.category;
  data.quantity = track_info.quantity;
  data.event_id = track_info.fb_event_id;
  
  if(typeof ft_facebook_api_track != 'undefined')
     ft_facebook_api_track(data);
  else //Opencart - Google Marketing Tools compatibility
     gmt_facebook_track(data);
</script>

<script>
var datalayer_data = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};

var object = {};

if (typeof datalayer_data.id !== 'undefined') {
    object.id = datalayer_data.id;
}
if (typeof datalayer_data.name !== 'undefined') {
    object.name = datalayer_data.name;
}
if (typeof datalayer_data.category !== 'undefined') {
    object.content_category = datalayer_data.category;
}
if (typeof datalayer_data.price !== 'undefined') {
    object.price = datalayer_data.price;
}
if (currency !== 'PLN') {
    object.currency = currency;
}
if (datalayer_data.sizes_domodi !== 'undefined') {
    object.sizes = datalayer_data.sizes_domodi;
}
if (typeof datalayer_data.quantity !== 'undefined') {
    object.quantity = datalayer_data.quantity;
}

  wph('track', 'AddToCart', {
    contents: [object]
  });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	window.uetq = window.uetq || [];
    var order_data ={{datalayer.order_data}}.order;
    var customer_data ={{datalayer.order_data}}.customer.general;
    var country_iso_code ={{datalayer.order_data}}.customer.payment.country_iso_code_2;
    var revenue_value = {{datalayer.getOrderTotal}};
    revenue_value = revenue_value.toFixed(2);
    
    var purchased_products = {{datalayer.order_data}}.products;
	var items = [];
	purchased_products.forEach( function(prod, index, array_element) {
	items.push({
		    'id' : prod.product_id,
            'quantity' : prod.quantity,
		    'price' : prod.price
		    
		});
	});
    
     window.uetq.push('event', '', {'revenue_value': revenue_value, 'currency': {{datalayer.current_currency}} });    
  
    window.uetq.push('set', { 'pid': {
      'em': formatEmail(customer_data.email),
      'ph': formatPhoneNumber(customer_data.phone), } 
    });  
	window.uetq.push (
		'event', 'purchase',
		{
            'transaction_id': order_data.id,
			'ecomm_pagetype': 'purchase',
			'event_label': 'purchase',
            'ecomm_totalvalue': revenue_value,
            'revenue_value': revenue_value,
			'currency': {{datalayer.current_currency}},
            'items' : items
		}
	);
  
  
  function formatEmail(email) {
    // Normalize the string to lowercase and remove diacritical marks.
    email = email.toLowerCase().normalize("NFD").replace(/[\u0300-\u036f]/g, "");

    // Remove everything between '+' and '@'.
    email = email.replace(/\+.+?(?=@)/, "");

    // Remove periods before the '@'.
    email = email.replace(/\.(?=.*@)/g, "");

    // Ensure the email does not end with a period.
    if (email.endsWith('.')) {
        email = email.slice(0, -1);
    }

    // Check for the presence of '@'.
    if (!email.includes('@')) {
        console.error("Invalid email: missing '@'");
        return null;
    }

    return email;
}
  function formatPhoneNumber(phoneNumber, countryCode) {
    // Remove non-digit characters from the phone number
    var digits = phoneNumber.replace(/\D/g, '');

    // Prepend the country code after ensuring there isn't one already
    if (!digits.startsWith(countryCode)) {
        digits = countryCode + digits;
    }

    // Add the '+' sign at the front if it's missing
    if (!digits.startsWith('+')) {
        digits = '+' + digits;
    }

    return digits;
}

</script>

parameter.value:
<script>
	var track_info = {{datalayer.addToWishlist}};
  	var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
	var object = {};
    var external_id = {{Facebook Conversions API - track_info}}.extenal_id;
  
	if(typeof track_info.id_fb != 'undefined')
		object.content_ids = track_info.id_fb;
  	if(typeof track_info.name != 'undefined')
		object.content_name = track_info.name;

	object.content_type = 'product';
  	object.currency = currency;
  	object.value = track_info.price;
    object.external_id = external_id;
  
    fbq('track', 'AddToWishlist', object, {'eventID': track_info.fb_event_id, 'externalID': external_id});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="//dynamic.criteo.com/js/ld/ld.js?a={{Criteo - Partner ID}}" async="true"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var criteo_id = {{Criteo - Partner ID}};
	var criteo_site_type = {{Criteo - Site Type}};
	var current_view = {{datalayer.current_view}};
	var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_view}};

	var criteo_params_array = [
		{ event: "setAccount", account: criteo_id },
		{ event: "setEmail", email: {{datalayer.email}} },
		{ event: "setSiteType", type: criteo_site_type }
	];
	var product_id = {{datalayer.product_details}}.product.product_id;
    criteo_params_array.push({event: 'viewItem', item: product_id});
    
    var criteoOneTagInterval = setInterval(track, 1000);
    function track() {
      if(typeof window.criteo_q !== 'undefined') {
        clearInterval(criteoOneTagInterval);
        window.criteo_q.push(criteo_params_array);
      }
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var criteo_id = {{Criteo - Partner ID}};
	var criteo_site_type = {{Criteo - Site Type}};
	var current_view = {{datalayer.current_view}};
	var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_view}};

	var criteo_params_array = [

		{ event: "setEmail", email: {{datalayer.email}} },
		{ event: "setSiteType", type: criteo_site_type }
	];
  
    var product_ids = {{datalayer.products_listed.product_ids}};

      }

<script type="text/javascript">
    var criteo_id = {{Criteo - Partner ID}};
	var criteo_site_type = {{Criteo - Site Type}};
	var current_view = {{datalayer.current_view}};
	var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_view}};

	var criteo_params_array = [
		{ event: "setAccount", account: criteo_id },
		{ event: "setEmail", email: {{datalayer.email}} },
		{ event: "setSiteType", type: criteo_site_type }
	];
	var cart_products = {{datalayer.cart_products}};

	var items = [];
	cart_products.forEach( function(prod, index, array_element) {
	items.push({
		    'id' : prod.product.product_id,
		    'price' : prod.product.prices.price.price,
		    'quantity' : prod.product.quantity
		});
	});
  
	criteo_params_array.push({event: 'viewBasket', currency: current_currency, item: items});
    
    var criteoOneTagInterval = setInterval(track, 1000);
    function track() {
      if(typeof window.criteo_q !== 'undefined') {
        clearInterval(criteoOneTagInterval);
        window.criteo_q.push(criteo_params_array);
      }
    }
</script>

  var criteo_id = {{Criteo - Partner ID}};
  var criteo_site_type = {{Criteo - Site Type}};

<script type="text/javascript">
    var criteo_id = {{Criteo - Partner ID}};
	var criteo_site_type = {{Criteo - Site Type}};
	var current_view = {{datalayer.current_view}};
	var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_view}};

	var criteo_params_array = [
		{ event: "setAccount", account: criteo_id },
		{ event: "setEmail", email: {{datalayer.email}} },
		{ event: "setSiteType", type: criteo_site_type }
	];
	var purchased_products = {{datalayer.order_data}}.products;
	var items = [];
	purchased_products.forEach( function(prod, index, array_element) {
	items.push({
		    'id' : prod.product_id,
		    'price' : prod.price,
		    'quantity' : prod.quantity
		});
	});
	criteo_params_array.push({event: 'trackTransaction', currency: current_currency, id: {{datalayer.order_data.order.id}}, item: items});
	var criteoOneTagInterval = setInterval(track, 1000);
    function track() {
      if(typeof window.criteo_q !== 'undefined') {
        clearInterval(criteoOneTagInterval);
        window.criteo_q.push(criteo_params_array);
      }
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var criteo_id = {{Criteo - Partner ID}};
	var criteo_site_type = {{Criteo - Site Type}};
	var current_view = {{datalayer.current_view}};
	var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_view}};

	var criteo_params_array = [
		{ event: "setAccount", account: criteo_id },
		{ event: "setEmail", email: {{datalayer.email}} },
		{ event: "setSiteType", type: criteo_site_type }
	];
  
    var product_ids = {{datalayer.products_listed.product_ids}};

    criteo_params_array.push({event: 'viewList', item: product_ids});
 
    var criteoOneTagInterval = setInterval(track, 1000);
    function track() {
      if(typeof window.criteo_q !== 'undefined') {
        clearInterval(criteoOneTagInterval);
        window.criteo_q.push(criteo_params_array);
      }

<script>
	var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};

	var productDetails = {{datalayer.product_details}};
	var object = {};
	productDetails = productDetails.product;
	if (typeof productDetails.product_id !== 'undefined') {
		object.id = productDetails.product_id;
	}
	if (typeof productDetails.name !== 'undefined') {
		object.name = productDetails.name;
	}
	if (typeof productDetails.category !== 'undefined') {
		object.category = productDetails.category;
	}
	if (typeof productDetails.prices.price.price !== 'undefined') {
		object.price = productDetails.prices.price.price;
	}
	if (currency !== 'PLN') {
		object.currency = currency;
	}
	if (productDetails.sizes_domodi !== 'undefined') {
		object.sizes = productDetails.sizes_domodi;
	}

	object.in_stock = true;
 
	wph('track','ViewContent', {'content_name': 'ViewProduct', 'contents':[object] });
</script>

<script>
	var order_data = {{datalayer.order_data}}.order;
    var products_purchased = {{datalayer.order_data}}.products;
    var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};

    var object = {};

    if (typeof order_data.id !== 'undefined') {
        object.transaction_id = order_data.id;
    }
    if (typeof order_data.subtotal !== 'undefined') {
        object.value = parseFloat(order_data.subtotal);
    }
    if (typeof order_data.total !== 'undefined') {
        object.value_gross = {{datalayer.getOrderTotal}};
    }
    if (typeof order_data.shipping !== 'undefined') {
        object.shipping_cost = parseFloat(order_data.shipping);
    }
    if (typeof order_data.coupon !== 'undefined') {
        object.discount_code = order_data.coupon;
    }
 
    var contents = [];
    if (typeof products_purchased !== 'undefined') {
        for (var key in products_purchased) {
            var element = products_purchased[key];
            var product = {
                id: element.product_id,
                name: element.name,
                price: element.price,
                quantity: element.quantity,
                in_stock: true,
            };
            contents.push(product);
        }
    }

    object.contents = contents;
    wph('track','Purchase',object);
</script>

<script>
	var productsListed = {{datalayer.products_listed}};

  if(typeof productsListed != 'undefined') {
    var object = [];
    
    for (var key in productsListed) {
      var re = productsListed[key].product;
      var obj_temp = [];
      if (typeof re.product_id !== 'undefined') {
        obj_temp.id = re.product_id;
      }
      if (typeof re.name !== 'undefined') {
        obj_temp.name = re.name;
      }
      if (typeof re.category !== 'undefined') {
        obj_temp.content_category = re.category;
      }
      if (typeof re.prices.price.price !== 'undefined') {
        obj_temp.price = re.prices.price.price;
      }
  
      obj_temp.in_stock = true;

      object.push(obj_temp);
    }
    wph('track','ViewContent', {'content_name': 'ProductList', 'contents' : object });
  }
</script>

<script>
    var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
    var track_name = 'CompletePayment';
    var order_data = {{datalayer.order_data}}.order;
    var customer_data = {{datalayer.order_data}}.customer;
    var products_purchased = {{datalayer.order_data}}.products;
  
    var contents = [];
    if (typeof products_purchased !== 'undefined') {
        for (var key in products_purchased) {
            var element = products_purchased[key];
            var product = {
                'content_id' : element.product_id,
                'content_type' : 'product',
                'content_name' : element.name,
                'quantity' : element.quantity,
                'price' : element.price
            };
            contents.push(product);
        }
    }
  
    var track_info = {
        'contents' : contents,
        'currency' : current_currency,
        'value' : {{datalayer.getOrderTotal}},
        'customer_data' : {
          'em': customer_data.tiktok_identify.email,
          'ph': customer_data.tiktok_identify.phone_number
        }
    };
  
    var tiktokInterval = setInterval(tiktokTrack, 1000);
	function tiktokTrack() {
		if(typeof ttq !== 'undefined') {
			clearInterval(tiktokInterval);
          
            //IDENTIFY
            if(typeof customer_data.tiktok_identify !== 'undefined')
              ttq.identify(customer_data.tiktok_identify);
          
			ttq.track(track_name,track_info);
		}
	}
</script>

<script>
    var current_currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
    var track_name = 'InitiateCheckout';
	var product_ids = {{datalayer.cart_products.product_ids}};
	var mum_elements = product_ids.length;
    var product_names = [];
    var product_quantities = [];
    var cartProducts = {{datalayer.cart_products}};
    if(typeof cartProducts != 'undefined') {
      for (var key in cartProducts) {
        var prod = cartProducts[key].product;
        product_names.push(prod.name);
        product_quantities.push(prod.quantity);
      }
    }
    
    if(product_names.length == 1) {
      product_names = product_names[0];
      product_quantities = product_quantities[0];
      product_ids = product_ids[0];
    }

    var track_info = {
        'content_id' : product_ids,
        'content_name' : product_names,
        'content_type' : "product",
        'currency' : current_currency,
        'value' : {{datalayer.cart_products.total}},
        'quantity' : product_quantities,
    };
  
	var tiktokInterval = setInterval(tiktokTrack, 1000);
	function tiktokTrack() {
		if(typeof ttq !== 'undefined') {
			clearInterval(tiktokInterval);
			ttq.track(track_name,track_info);
		}
	}
</script>

<script>

      	event = "Purchase";

<script src="https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js" async defer></script>
<script>
  function google_review_products(products) {
    var product_gtins = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < products.length; i++) {
      var prod = products[i];
      product_gtins.push({'gtin':prod.product_id_gb});
    }
    return product_gtins;
  }
  function google_review_delivery_date(dateString, daysToAdd) {
    if(!Number.isInteger(daysToAdd)) daysToAdd = 7;
    
    var parts = dateString.split("-");
    var year = parseInt(parts[0], 10);
    var month = parseInt(parts[1], 10) - 1; // JavaScript months are 0-indexed
    var day = parseInt(parts[2], 10);
  
    var currentDate = new Date(year, month, day);
    currentDate.setDate(currentDate.getDate() + daysToAdd);
  
    var newYear = currentDate.getFullYear();
    var newMonth = currentDate.getMonth() + 1; // Adjust for 0-indexed months
    var newDay = currentDate.getDate();
    if (newMonth < 10) {
      newMonth = "0" + newMonth;
    }
    if (newDay < 10) {
      newDay = "0" + newDay;
    }

    var newDateString = newYear + "-" + newMonth + "-" + newDay;
    return newDateString;
  }

  var googleReviewInterval = setInterval(google_review_track, 1000);
	function google_review_track() {
		if(typeof window.gapi !== 'undefined') {
			clearInterval(googleReviewInterval);

			window.___gcfg = {
		      lang: {{datalayer.lang}}
		    };
		    window.gapi.load('surveyoptin', function() {
		        var order_date = {{datalayer.order_data}}.order.date_added;
		        var order_products = {{datalayer.order_data}}.products;             
		        var object_render = {
					"merchant_id": {{Google review - merchant id}},
					"order_id": {{datalayer.order_data.order.id}},
					"email": {{datalayer.order_data.order.id}},
					"delivery_country": {{datalayer.order_data}}.customer.shipping.country_iso_code_2,
					"estimated_delivery_date": google_review_delivery_date(order_date, {{Google review - delivery date}}),
					"opt_in_style": {{Google review - style}},
					"products" : google_review_products(order_products) 
				};
			    window.gapi.surveyoptin.render(object_render); 
			  });
		}
	}
</script>

<script>
  var stileoInterval = setInterval(stileoTrack, 1000);
  var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
  function stileoTrack() {
	if(typeof stileo !== 'undefined') {
	  	clearInterval(stileoInterval);
      	event = "GoToCheckout";
	    var items = [];
	    var cart_products = {{datalayer.cart_products}};
	    if(typeof cart_products[0].product.prices.price_euro.price === 'undefined') {
	      console.error("FlowyTracking error: Stileo pixel only is compatible with EUR currency, please install EUR currency in your shop");
	    } else {
	      cart_products.forEach( function(product, index, array_element) {
	        items.push({
	          Id : product.product.product_id,
	          Name : product.product.name,
	          Price : product.product.prices.price_euro.price,
	          Brand : product.product.manufacturer,
	          Quantity : product.product.quantity

	          /* TODO
	            OldPrice : xxx,  WHEN HAS SPECIAL
	            CategoryPath : xxx,  THE CATEGORY PATH FULL URL
	            PhotoUrl : xxx   THE PRODUCT MAIN IMAGE URL
	           */
	        });
	      });
	    }
	    stileo('track', event, {
	      "Currency": currency,
	      "Products": items
	    });
	}
  }  
</script>

<script>
	var stileoInterval = setInterval(stileoTrack, 1000);
	function stileoTrack() {
		if(typeof stileo !== 'undefined') {
			clearInterval(stileoInterval);
		
			var products = {{datalayer.products_listed}};
			if(typeof products[0].product.prices.price_euro.price === 'undefined') {
				console.error("Stileo pixel only is compatible with EUR currency, please install EUR currency in your shop");
			} else {
				var items = [];
				$.each(products, function(index, value) {
					var product = products[index].product;
					items.push({
						Id : product.product_id,
						Name : product.name,
						Price : product.prices.price_euro.price,
						Brand : product.manufacturer,
					});
				}); 
				var object = {
					"ContentType": 'ProductGroup',
					"Products": items
				};
				stileo('track', event, object);
			}
		}
	}  
</script>

<script>

	            Brand : product_details.product.manufacturer,
	          });
	        var object = {
	          "ContentType": ContentType,
	          "Products": items
	        };
	        stileo('track', event, object);

	    }
	}
  }  
</script>

<script>
  var skroutzInterval = setInterval(skroutzTrack, 1000);
    function skroutzTrack() {
      if(typeof skroutz_analytics !== 'undefined') {
        clearInterval(skroutzInterval);
        var order_data = {{datalayer.order_data}};
        var products_purchased = order_data.products;
        var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
        var order_object = {
          order_id:      order_data.order.id,
          revenue:       order_data.order.total,
          shipping:      order_data.order.shipping,
          tax:           order_data.order.tax,
          paid_by:       order_data.order.payment_code,
          paid_by_descr:       order_data.order.payment_method
        };
        skroutz_analytics('ecommerce', 'addOrder', order_object);

        if (typeof products_purchased !== 'undefined') {
            for (var key in products_purchased) {
                var element = products_purchased[key];
                var product_object = {
                  order_id:   order_data.order.id,
                  product_id: element.product_id,
                  name:       element.name,
                  price:      element.price_with_tax,
                  quantity:   element.quantity
                };
                skroutz_analytics('ecommerce', 'addItem', product_object);
            }
        }
      }
    }
</script>

<script>
  
  function fb_pixel_makeid(length) {
    var result           = '';
    var characters       = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789';
    var charactersLength = characters.length;
    for ( var i = 0; i < length; i++ ) {
        result += characters.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charactersLength));
    }
    return result;
  }

  !function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
  n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
  n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
  t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
  document,'script','https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
  
  var track_info = {{Facebook Conversions API - track_info}};
  if(typeof track_info !== 'undefined') {
  
    var external_id = track_info.external_id;
    var event_id = track_info.event_id;
    var event_id_page_view = fb_pixel_makeid(36);
  
    fbq('init', {{Facebook Pixel - Facebook Conversions API - Pixel ID}}, {'external_id' : external_id});
    fbq('track', 'PageView', {'eventID': event_id_page_view});
  }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var addToCart = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
  var products = {{datalayer.products_listed}};
  var cartProducts = {{datalayer.cart_products}}.map(function(p){
    p = p.product;
    var cart_product = {
         "ProductID": p.product_id,
         "SKU": p.sku,
         "ProductName": p.name,
         "Quantity": p.quantity,
         "ItemPrice": p.prices.price.price,
         "RowTotal": p.prices.price.price * p.quantity,
         "ProductURL": p.url,
         "ImageURL": p.image_url,
         "ProductCategories": [p.category]
    }
    return cart_product;
  })
  
   _learnq.push(["track", "Added to Cart", {
     "$email": {{datalayer.email}},
     "$value": addToCart.price,
     "AddedItemProductName": addToCart.name,
     "AddedItemProductID": addToCart.id,
     "AddedItemSKU": '', //TODO
     "AddedItemCategories": [addToCart.category],
     "AddedItemImageURL": '', //TODO
     "AddedItemURL": '', //TODO
     "AddedItemPrice": addToCart.price,
     "AddedItemQuantity": addToCart.quantity,
     "ItemNames": [addToCart.name],
     "Items": cartProducts
   }]);
 </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var _learnq = _learnq || [];
  var data = {{datalayer.addToWishlist}};
  
  _learnq.push(['track', 'Add to wish list', {

  }]);
</script>

  }]);

<script type="text/javascript">
var _learnq = _learnq || [];
  var promotion_id = {{datalayer.promotionClicked}}.promotion_id;
    var promotionsListed = {{datalayer.promotions_listed}};
    var promotionClicked = promotionsListed.find(function(promotion){
      return promotion.id == promotion_id;
    });
  _learnq.push(['track', 'Promotion click', {

    "promotion_clicked": promotionClicked,
  }]);
</script>

tag.name: LinkedIn Insight - Add to wish list

parameter.value:
<!-- Twitter conversion tracking event code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  // Insert Twitter Event ID
  var addToCart = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
  var currentCurrency = {{datalayer.current_currency}}
  twq('event', 'tw-ogo25-ogom4', {
    value: addToCart.price,
    currency: currentCurrency, 
    contents: [
        {
          content_type: addToCart.brand,
          content_id: addToCart.id,
          content_name: addToCart.name,
          content_price: addToCart.price,
          num_items: addToCart.quantity,
          content_group_id: addToCart.category
        }], 
    conversion_id: {{datalayer.clientId}}, // use this to pass a unique ID for the conversion event for deduplication (e.g. order id '1a2b3c')
    email_address: {{datalayer.email}}, // use this to pass a user’s email address
  });
</script>
<!-- End Twitter conversion tracking event code -->

<!-- Twitter conversion tracking event code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  var addToWishlist = {{datalayer.addToWishlist}};
  
  twq('event', 'tw-ogo25-ogo2o', {
    value: addToWishlist.price, // use this to pass the value of the conversion (e.g. 5.00)
    currency: {{datalayer.current_currency}},
    contents: [
        {
          content_type: addToWishlist.brand,
          content_id: addToWishlist.id,
          content_name: addToWishlist.name,
          content_price: addToWishlist.price,
          num_items: addToWishlist.quantity,
          content_group_id: addToWishlist.category
        },
        ], 
    conversion_id: {{datalayer.clientId}},
    email_address: {{datalayer.email}}
  });
</script>
<!-- End Twitter conversion tracking event code -->

<!-- Twitter conversion tracking event code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  var cartProducts = {{datalayer.cart_products}};
  var contents = cartProducts.map(function(product){
    product = product.product;
    return {
      content_type: product.category,
      content_id: product.product_id,
      content_name: product.name,
      content_price: product.prices.price.price,
      num_items: product.quantity,
      content_group_id: product.category
    };
  });
  twq('event', 'tw-ogo25-ogo2l', {
    value: {{datalayer.cart_products.total}},
    currency: {{datalayer.current_currency}},
    contents: contents, 
    conversion_id: {{datalayer.clientId}}, 
    email_address: {{datalayer.email}}
  });
</script>
<!-- End Twitter conversion tracking event code -->

<!-- Twitter conversion tracking event code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  var productsListed = {{datalayer.products_listed}};
  if(typeof productsListed !== 'undefined') {
    var products = productsListed.map(function(p){
      p = p.product;
      return {
          content_type: product.category,
          content_id: product.product_id,
          content_name: product.name,
          content_price: product.prices.price.price,
          num_items: product.quantity,
          content_group_id: product.category
        };
    });
  } else {
    var products = [];
  }
  var product = {{datalayer.product_details}}.product;
  twq('event', 'tw-ogo25-ogo2m', {
    value: product.prices.price.price,
    currency: {{datalayer.current_currency}}, 
    contents: products, 
    conversion_id: {{datalayer.clientId}},
    email_address: {{datalayer.email}}
  });
</script>
<!-- End Twitter conversion tracking event code -->

<!-- Twitter conversion tracking event code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  var orderData = {{datalayer.order_data}};
  var orderProducts = {{datalayer.order_data}}.products;
  var products = orderProducts.map(function(product){
    return {
      content_type: product.category,
      content_id: product.product_id,
      content_name: product.name,
      content_price: product.price,
      num_items: product.quantity,
      content_group_id: product.category
    };
  });
  twq('event', 'tw-ogo25-ogo2o', {
    value: {{datalayer.getOrderTotal}},
    currency: {{datalayer.current_currency}},
    contents: products, 
    conversion_id: {{datalayer.order_data.order.id}},
    email_address: orderData.customer.general.email,
    phone_number: orderData.customer.general.phone
  });
</script>
<!-- End Twitter conversion tracking event code -->

<!-- Twitter conversion tracking event code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  var productsListed = {{datalayer.products_listed}};
  var contents = productsListed.map(function(product){
    return {
      content_type: product.category,
      content_id: product.product_id,
      content_name: product.name,
      content_price: product.prices.price.price,
      num_items: product.quantity,
      content_group_id: product.category
    };
  });
  twq('event', 'tw-ogo25-ogo2q', {
    search_string: {{datalayer.string_searched}}, 
    currency: {{datalayer.current_currency}},
    contents: products, 
    conversion_id: {{datalayer.clientId}}, 
    email_address: {{datalayer.email}},
  });
</script>
<!-- End Twitter conversion tracking event code -->

<script type="text/javascript">
  var email = {{datalayer.email}};
  var eventHandler = {{mailchimp.eventHandler}};
  var properties = {
    email: email,
  };
  
  eventHandler('account_registered', email, properties);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var email = {{datalayer.email}};
  var eventHandler = {{mailchimp.eventHandler}};
  var addToCart = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
  var datalayerCartProducts = {{datalayer.cart_products}};
  if(datalayerCartProducts) {
    var cartProducts = [];
    for (var key in datalayerCartProducts) {
      product = datalayerCartProducts[key].product;
    
      var product_formatted =  {
           "ProductID": product.product_id,
           "SKU": product.sku,
           "ProductName": product.name,
           "Quantity": product.quantity,
           "ItemPrice": product.prices.price.price,
           "RowTotal": product.prices.price.price * product.quantity,
           "ProductURL": product.url,
           "ImageURL": product.image_url,
           "ProductCategories": [product.category]
        }
        cartProducts.push(product_formatted);
    }
  } else {
    var cartProducts = [];
  }

  var properties = {
     "email": email,
     "value": addToCart.price,
     "AddedItemProductName": addToCart.name,
     "AddedItemProductID": addToCart.id,
     "AddedItemSKU": typeof addToCart.sku != "undefined" ? addToCart.sku : '',
     "AddedItemCategories": [addToCart.category],
     "AddedItemImageURL": typeof addToCart.image_url != "undefined" ? addToCart.image_url : '',
     "AddedItemURL": typeof addToCart.url != "undefined" ? addToCart.url : '',
     "AddedItemPrice": addToCart.price,
     "AddedItemQuantity": addToCart.quantity,
     "ItemNames": [addToCart.name],
     "Items": cartProducts
  };
  console.log(properties);
  eventHandler('add_to_cart', email, properties);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var email = {{datalayer.email}};
  var eventHandler = {{mailchimp.eventHandler}};
  
  var properties = {
    "email": email,
    "data": {{datalayer.addToWishlist}}
  };
  
  eventHandler('add_to_wishlist', email, properties);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var email = {{datalayer.email}};
  var eventHandler = {{mailchimp.eventHandler}};
  var product_details = {{datalayer.product_details}};
  var promotion_id = {{datalayer.promotionClicked}}.promotion_id;
  var promotionsListed = {{datalayer.promotions_listed}};
  var promotionClicked = promotionsListed.find(function(promotion){
    return promotion.id == promotion_id;
  });
  var properties = {
    "email": email,
    "promotion_clicked": promotionClicked,
  };
  
  eventHandler('promotion_click', email, properties);

  var email = {{datalayer.email}};
  var eventHandler = {{mailchimp.eventHandler}};
  
  var properties = {
    "email": email,
    "string_searched": {{datalayer.string_searched}},
    "products_listed": {{datalayer.products_listed}}
  };
  
  eventHandler('search', email, properties);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var email = {{datalayer.email}};
  var eventHandler = {{mailchimp.eventHandler}};
  var productDetails = {{datalayer.product_details}};
   var item = {
     "ProductName": productDetails.product.name,
     "ProductID": productDetails.product.product_id,
     "SKU": productDetails.product.sku,
     "Categories": [productDetails.category],
     "ImageURL": productDetails.product.image_url,
     "URL": productDetails.product.url,
     "Brand": productDetails.manufacturer,
     "Price": productDetails.product.prices.price.price,
     "CompareAtPrice": productDetails.product.prices.price.price
   };
  var properties = {
    "email": email,
    "product": item
  };
  
  eventHandler('view_product', email, properties);
</script>
